sentence: Here is where each remaining candidate's challenge currently stands: Perry Johnson Johnson filed a lawsuit Friday in the Michigan Court of Appeals alleging that the review of the signatures he submitted to qualify for the primary ballot violated state election law because a signature-by-signature review comparing the one on the petition with the one on the voter's registration file was not carried out.
author: Arpan Lobo
title: Disqualified Republican governor hopefuls battle it out in court
